Job Description: Job Requisition                         1. Strong development experience in Model Building Activities; Module Action creation and Dashboard design etc.     2. Understand of business processes in Anaplan including but not limited to model architecture, master data management and workflow     3. Knowledge and ability to build models based on Anaplan Best Practices     4. Ability to bring solutions and independently handle the development activities     5. Knowledge on Anaplan ALM (Application Lifecycle Management) and production deployment procedures     6. Audit of the models meeting key business users aimed to analyze existent business processes inefficiency, connected solution, model optimization and improvements according to latest Anaplan platform capabilities     7. Handson strong working proficiency in Data Import/Export between Anaplan models     8. Hands-on Anaplan calculation functions     9. Enhancements of the model based on the feedback, bugs fixing and maintenance     10. Good Excel knowledge
